name: intl-relativeformat
description: Formats JavaScript dates to relative time strings.
author: Caridy Patino <caridy@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run cldr && tsc -p src && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.test: TS_NODE_PROJECT='tests/tsconfig.json' mocha -r ts-node/register -r source-map-support/register -r chai/register-expect tests/index.ts --reporter spec
